alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 14 at 2:43PM EDT until October 15 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Norfolk/Portsmouth and Hampton/Poquoson Counties, and Chesapeake and Virginia Beach. * WHEN...Sunday afternoon during high tides. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/10 PM 3.8 1.0 1.2 1 NONE 15/10 AM 4.5 1.7 1.4 3 MINOR 15/10 PM 4.2 1.4 1.6 2 NONE 16/11 AM 4.5 1.7 1.4 1-2 MINOR 16/11 PM 3.7 0.9 1.2 1 NONE 17/11 AM 4.2 1.4 1.1 1 NONE CHESAPEAKE BAY BRIDGE TUNNEL VA MLLW CATEGORIES -
